_⚠️ Potential issue_

**Placeholder typo in the same block**

`emails.invitation.subject` (line 26) shows `s%` instead of `%s`, breaking `sprintf`.  
Fix it while you’re here:

```diff
-"emails.invitation.subject": "Invitació a l'equip %s a s%",
+"emails.invitation.subject": "Invitació a l'equip %s a %s",
```  



Also applies to: 24-25, 31-32

<details>
<summary>🤖 Prompt for AI Agents</summary>

```
In app/config/locale/translations/ca.json around lines 24 to 32, the placeholder
syntax uses 's%' instead of '%s', which breaks sprintf formatting. Correct all
instances of 's%' to '%s' in the keys emails.invitation.subject, and also check
and fix the placeholders in lines 24-25 and 31-32 to use the proper '%s' format.
```

</details>

discussion_comments.comment_body:
_⚠️ Potential issue_

**Placeholder syntax error breaks template rendering.**

`"Elfogadni meghívást a {{team}-re"` has an opening `{{` but is missing the closing `}}`, which will bust Mustache rendering and likely leak “{{team}-re” verbatim to users.

Suggested fix (also makes the wording more idiomatic):

```diff
-"emails.invitation.buttonText": "Elfogadni meghívást a {{team}-re",
+"emails.invitation.buttonText": "{{team}} csapat meghívásának elfogadása"
```

Verify with any downstream placeholders before merging.



> Committable suggestion skipped: line range outside the PR's diff.

<details>
<summary>🤖 Prompt for AI Agents</summary>

```
In app/config/locale/translations/hu.json at line 31, the placeholder syntax is
incorrect because the opening {{ is not properly closed with }}. Fix this by
changing "{{team}-re" to "{{team}}-re" to correctly close the placeholder and
ensure proper Mustache template rendering. Also, review the wording to make it
more idiomatic as suggested before finalizing.
```

</details>

discussion_comments.comment_body:
_⚠️ Potential issue_

**Malformed placeholder – closing braces missing around `{{team}}`**  

`emails.invitation.buttonText` currently reads  
`"Elfogadni meghívást a {{team}-re"`  
which will be interpreted as a single placeholder named `team}-re` and break runtime substitution.

Fix:

```diff
-"emails.invitation.buttonText": "Elfogadni meghívást a {{team}-re",
+"emails.invitation.buttonText": "Elfogadni meghívást a {{team}}-re",
```



Also applies to: 24-24, 31-31

<details>
<summary>🤖 Prompt for AI Agents</summary>

```
In app/config/locale/translations/hu.json at lines 11, 24, and 31, the
placeholders like {{team}-re} are malformed because they are missing the closing
double braces around the placeholder name. Fix this by ensuring that all
placeholders are properly enclosed with double curly braces, for example, change
{{team}-re} to {{team}}-re to allow correct runtime substitution.
```

</details>

**Placeholder typo in invitation subject**  
Within the same hunk, `%s a s%` swaps the second placeholder. This will leak `s%` literally in emails.

```diff
-"emails.invitation.subject": "Invitació a l'equip %s a s%",
+"emails.invitation.subject": "Invitació a l'equip %s a %s",
```
